column2: machine infrastructure and a shed for machine sheltering.The water used is not includedDataset adapted from sprinkler irrigation as follows (all assumptions):• Tractor operation is doubled• Excavation is doubled• Diesel use and emissions for tractor operation and excavation are doubled• Water hoses are removed
